data.title: Online ERG Leadership Development
data.meta_description: Upskill your ERG leaders with our cutting-edge online development program. Online leadership development program for ERG and Employee Network leaders.
data.text:
Are you looking to invest in skills and competencies for your ERG leaders? Do you want to provide a clear development framework for new leaders, as well as those more experienced? We provide two state-of-the-art online learning programs for aspiring and more experienced ERG leaders and leaders-to-be. We work with participants from organizations seeking a cutting-edge program to provide their ERG leaders with the investment needed to allow them to excel and grow ERGs that are inclusive but drive clear business outcomes. Our programs run three times a year in January, April, and September.

The Impetus Online ERG Leadership program

​

Each program consists of 12 pre-recorded modules, lasting approximately 15 minutes each. The course material is provided through a custom learning platform. It is accessible around-the-clock from any time zone.

The programs include facilitated live sessions designed to help learners apply their knowledge and reflect on the content.

​

We offer a ‘Foundation’ level leadership program for up-and-coming leaders and an ‘Enhanced’ level program for more seasoned leaders and those who have successfully completed the Foundation program.

​

​

​

Our programs are an excellent way to support your Network/Group leaders to have impact and stay motivated. If you are interested to find out more, please do get in contact.

​

​

​

​

Contact us for more information

For more information or to sign up to take part, please contact us at hello@impetusandmomentum.com or book a time to speak with us.
